item.title: 167 Kilburn High Road NW6, 3rd February
item.description:
A large piece of concrete size of a fist or larger feel from 167 outer wall onto the pavement this morning at about 08:45 as I was walking west to east on the same pavement if I was 2 seconds later arriving at the point of concrete fall â„¹ would be in hospital now with a broke skull. Thank you.

item.title: Outside 37a Broadhurst Gardens, 3rd February
item.description:
I am writing to formally dispute the status of the report regarding the pavement outside No. 37a. Although the state has been changed to "Fixed," I can confirm that the hazard remains present and dangerous. The pavement slab is still loose and unstable; stepping on one corner causes the other side to lift, creating a severe trip hazard. As this is located directly outside a day nursery, this is a matter of significant public safety. We have already witnessed several individuals trip while carrying young children.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57-59, Broadhurst Gardens, South Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 3rd February
item.description:
Last week I reported a street light not working on the pathway between Glendower Crescent and Coleridge Way. This light is located between flat blocks 25-30 & 31-36 Coleridge Way.This light was out all of last night and seems to go on and off possibly something is loose.As there is no other lighting it is not nice for older people or women to walk through this pathway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glendower Crescent, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
